metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4173 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: vim is vulnerable to Use After Free

notes.Note: ccdm94> introduced by commit 04b12697838 (>= 8.2.0695). The patch for this CVE is related to the patch for CVE-2022-0156.

criterions.comment: vim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
